name: PUT - As a user i want to update topic name for thread

testSteps.description: 1: PUT - As a user i want to update topic name for thread ({id_topic=1, data=Drama Korea, status_code=200, response=success})

children.description: Given I set an endpoint for update topic with 1
When I request data "Drama Korea" with PUT and 1 for topic name

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: x-requested-with, Authorization, Content-Type, credential, X-Import-Process, X-XSRF-TOKEN
Access-Control-Max-Age: 3600
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true

X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block

Expires: 0
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Thu, 21 Jul 2022 09:03:33 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

children.description: Then I validate the status code 200
And I validate that the topic has been changed into "Drama Korea" and validate the "success"

userStory.narrative:
As a user
  i want to get topic
  so that i can categorize the thread
